snippet.title: Endeavor | Trailer
snippet.description:
Endeavor on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3008810

Endeavor is a 3D Space Adventure. Your purpose is to explore, investigate, gather, build and battle your way through the unknown frontiers of infinite space-time. Grow your skills and abilities with the resources you gather and build a team capable of surviving the unknown universe.

Explore an infinite universe
- Traverse vast, procedurally generated galaxies teeming with undiscovered sectors of space.
- Encounter diverse topologies from asteroid belts to solar systems and explore the planets, suns, asteroids, and meteors of deep space.

Gather resources
- Mine valuable resources from planets, asteroids, and meteors.
- Collect rare materials to craft advanced technologies and upgrades.

Ensure your survival
- Manage your ship's systems, including life support, energy, shields, weapons and abilities
- Overcome unknown challenges as you traverse through deep space where all entities have gravitational pull.

Choose your adventure
- Engage in dynamic, real-time combat against hostile entities.
- Choose your own path as you journey through Deep Space.

#Endeavor #ShreyGames #Indie #GameDev #GameRelease #Gaming
